help-file.title: "MINOR PARALYSIS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
This spell allows the caster to "freeze" his or her victim, preventing any actions by the victim for a limited time, or until someone strikes the victim. The more powerful version of this spell is known as "Major Paralysis".
